text:
SoR 2  is amongst the top, but not all tracks, Its little from song to song,
But same goes for most games so its fair,but: ESWAT, RAYMAN 2D (or was that on saturn?), Johnny Bazookatone, Ghostbusters!, i actualy liked Moonwalker, Batman the game (i come to Mega-CD later..) , Hang-on, Two Crude dudes(if remeber right..those beat-emups..) +  several more but too late now.  I must name a few Mega-CD games gonna make your ears so clean: Sonic-CD Jap!  Wonderdog,  Jaguarxj220, Batman returns FULL CD.
